item.title: 未偿还国债突破 30 万亿美元，自 2018 年以来翻了一番
item.description: 美国政府的国债首次突破 30 万亿美元— 自 2018 年以来，随着大流行病时期借贷激增的影响，美国政府的国债增加了一倍多。【原文：US government debt in Treasuries topped $30 trillion for the first time — having more than doubled since 2018 as the pandemic-era borrowing surge takes its toll.】

item.title: 简街交易额因押注人类学公司而大幅增长
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，简街集团今年创下的记录得益于对人工智能热潮的精明押注，这在其交易业绩中表现为巨大的收益。【原文：Jane Street Group’s record haul this year has been boosted by savvy bets on the artificial intelligence boom that are showing up as big gains in its trading results, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 富国银行增聘重要前端交易员，发展市场业务
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，富国银行从德意志银行（Deutsche Bank AG）聘用了两名短期交易员，这是在美联储今年早些时候取消了对该银行的资产上限后，富国银行努力拓展市场业务的一部分。【原文：Wells Fargo & Co. hired two short-duration traders from Deutsche Bank AG, part of efforts to expand its markets business after the Federal Reserve lifted an asset cap on the bank earlier this year, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 高盛支持的巴西数据中心探索供电方案
item.description: 巴西最大的公用事业公司正在探索各种方案，以保证一个价值 500 亿美元的数据中心项目的电力供应，该项目旨在使里约热内卢成为拉丁美洲人工智能的前沿。【原文：Brazil’s biggest utility is exploring options to guarantee the power supply for a $50 billion data center project aimed at putting Rio de Janeiro at the forefront of artificial intelligence in Latin America.】

item.title: 富国银行聘请 Jackie Krese 担任基金融资银团业务主管
item.description: 据一位知情人士透露，富国银行已聘请 Jackie Krese 担任基金融资部常务董事兼全球银团业务主管。【原文：Wells Fargo has hired Jackie Krese as a managing director and global head of syndications within its fund finance group, according to a person with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 蓝猫头鹰为数据中心专项基金融资 17 亿美元
item.description: 在收购数据中心专业公司 IPI Partners 约一年后，蓝猫资本公司（Blue Owl Capital Inc.【原文：Blue Owl Capital Inc. raised $1.7 billion for its latest digital infrastructure fund, about a year after the firm acquired data center specialist IPI Partners.】

item.title: Esentia 认为墨西哥的数据中心将推动对管道的需求
item.description: 墨西哥 Esentia 能源开发公司希望数据中心的蓬勃发展能促进其管道业务的发展，因为墨西哥正在努力建设能源和人工智能基础设施，以便与该地区的同行竞争。【原文：Mexico’s Esentia Energy Development expects a boom in data centers to bolster its pipeline business, as the country races to build out energy and AI infrastructure to compete with its regional peers.】

item.title: 捷克亿万富翁将公司托管以重返总理岗位
item.description: 捷克亿万富翁安德烈-巴比斯（Andrej Babis）表示，他将把自己的企业集团 Agrofert 托管给一个盲目的信托机构，以避免下周重返总理岗位时出现利益冲突。【原文：Czech billionaire Andrej Babis said he will place his conglomerate Agrofert into a blind trust to avoid conflict-of-interest claims when he returns as premier next week.】

item.title: 价格飙升，墨丘利从伦敦金属交易所大量撤出铜矿
item.description: 摩科瑞能源集团（Mercuria Energy Group Ltd.）已从伦敦金属交易所（London Metal Exchange）监管的仓库中订购了约 5 亿美元的铜，以应对美国可能加征关税导致的全球供应紧张。【原文：Mercuria Energy Group Ltd. has ordered about $500 million of copper for withdrawal from warehouses overseen by the London Metal Exchange, as the trading house positions itself for a global supply crunch fueled by possible US tariffs.】

item.title: 据说 Citadel 的 Apex 公司将从杰里-琼斯的 Comstock 公司购买天然气资产
item.description: 熟悉内情的人士透露，对冲基金巨头 Citadel 旗下的 Apex Natural Gas 公司已同意以约 4.3 亿美元的价格从亿万富翁、达拉斯牛仔队老板杰里-琼斯（Jerry Jones）的 Comstock Resources 公司手中收购得克萨斯州的天然气资产。【原文：Apex Natural Gas, owned by hedge fund giant Citadel, has agreed to buy natural gas assets in Texas for about $430 million from billionaire Dallas Cowboys owner Jerry Jones’ Comstock Resources Inc., people familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 维托尔计划为哥伦比亚新液化天然气项目供货
item.description: 该项目开发商表示，预计维托尔集团将从 2027 年起为哥伦比亚一个新的液化天然气进口终端提供为期五年的供应。【原文：Vitol Group is expected to supply a new liquefied natural gas import terminal in Colombia for five years starting in 2027, the project’s developer said.】

item.title: 人工智能推理模型的崛起伴随着巨大的能源权衡
item.description: 几乎所有领先的人工智能开发商都在致力于建立能模仿人类推理方式的人工智能模型，但新的研究表明，这些尖端系统的能耗要高得多，这加剧了人们对人工智能给电网带来的压力的担忧。【原文：Nearly all leading artificial intelligence developers are focused on building AI models that mimic the way humans reason, but new research shows these cutting-edge systems can be far more energy intensive, adding to concerns about AI’s strain on power grids.】

item.title: 在帕斯计划重新开放之际，走私调查困扰着玻利维亚天然气公司 YPFB
item.description: 玻利维亚警方本周对国有天然气公司 YPFB 的办公室进行了突击检查，称他们发现了涉及燃料走私补贴和违规合同的数百万美元的腐败计划。【原文：Bolivian police have conducted raids throughout the week at the offices of state-owned natural gas company YPFB, saying they’re uncovering multimillion-dollar corruption schemes involving subsidized fuel smuggling and irregular contracts.】

item.title: CFTC 为在注册交易所进行现货加密货币交易铺平道路
item.description: 美国商品期货交易委员会（Commodity Futures Trading Commission）周四表示，随着特朗普政府进一步拥抱数字资产行业，上市的现货加密产品将获准在注册期货交易所开始交易。【原文：Listed spot crypto products will be allowed to start trading on registered futures exchanges, the Commodity Futures Trading Commission said Thursday, as the Trump administration moves to further embrace the digital asset industry.】

item.title: 数据中心故障导致芝加哥商品交易所瘫痪，CyrusOne 停止债券销售
item.description: 在全球最大的衍生品交易所之一遭遇重大故障后，高盛集团（Goldman Sachs Group Inc.【原文：Goldman Sachs Group Inc. has paused a planned $1.3 billion mortgage-bond sale for CyrusOne, the data-center operator that supports CME Group Inc., after a major outage that hit one of the world’s largest derivatives exchanges.】

item.title: 报告称俄罗斯禁止使用 Snapchat 和 FaceTime
item.description: 据国际文传电讯社（Interfax）报道，俄罗斯禁止Snap公司的Snapchat和苹果公司的FaceTime，进一步限制了西方通讯服务的使用。【原文：Russia banned Snap Inc.’s Snapchat and Apple Inc.’s FaceTime, further limiting access to Western communication services, according to Interfax.】

item.title: 穆迪下调泽西市信用评级一档，称其 "举步维艰
item.description: 穆迪评级公司将泽西城的信用等级从 A1 下调一级至 A2，称这一评级反映了泽西城在财政上 "陷入困境，流动性状况不断恶化"。【原文：Moody’s Ratings cut Jersey City’s credit grade one step to A2 from A1, saying the rating reflected a financially “struggling city with a deteriorating liquidity profile.”】

item.title: 美国抵押贷款利率连续两周下降至 10 月以来最低水平
item.description: 抵押贷款利率连续第二周下降，达到 10 月底以来的最低水平。【原文：Mortgage rates dropped for a second week, hitting the lowest level since late October.】

item.title: 大众汽车将保留德累斯顿生产基地作为人工智能和芯片技术中心
item.description: 大众汽车公司（Volkswagen AG）计划在停止汽车生产后，将其位于德累斯顿的小型装配厂改造成一个创新中心，以兑现避免关闭德国工厂的承诺。【原文：Volkswagen AG plans to convert its small-scale assembly plant in Dresden into an innovation hub after stopping car output, following through on a pledge to avoid factory closures in Germany.】

item.title: 比尔-盖茨之女为明星支持的人工智能公司投资 3000 万美元
item.description: 菲比-盖茨（Phoebe Gates）是微软公司的亿万富翁比尔-盖茨（Bill Gates）和梅琳达-盖茨（Melinda French Gates）的女儿，根据彭博社看到的一份投资计划书，她正在为一家将人工智能应用于网上购物的初创公司 Phia 筹集 3000 万美元的新资金。【原文：Phoebe Gates, daughter of Microsoft Corp.’s billionaire founder Bill Gates and Melinda French Gates, is raising $30 million in new funding for Phia, a startup applying artificial intelligence to online shopping, according to a pitch deck seen by Bloomberg.】

item.title: 勒布朗称卡尼不打算在国际足联活动中与特朗普谈论贸易问题
item.description: 加拿大总理马克-卡尼（Mark Carney）不打算在周五与美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）在国际足联 2026 年世界杯赛事上会面时讨论贸易问题，尽管谈判已经停滞了一个多月。【原文：Canadian Prime Minister Mark Carney isn’t planning to discuss trade with US President Donald Trump when they meet for the FIFA 2026 World Cup event on Friday, even though talks have been stalled for more than a month.】

item.title: 美国延长对卢克石油非俄罗斯加油站的制裁豁免期
item.description: 特朗普政府延长了卢克石油公司（Lukoil PJSC）在俄罗斯境外加油站的豁免权，允许这些加油站继续运营至 2026 年 4 月底。【原文：The Trump administration extended a waiver for Lukoil PJSC’s gas stations outside of Russia, allowing them to continue operations until late April 2026.】

item.title: 今年的获奖者继续获奖
item.description: 大家好，欢迎收看《奇货可居》时事通讯，这里每天都有来自《奇货可居》的精彩内容。有时是我们乔-韦森塔尔（Joe Weisenthal）和特蕾西-阿洛维（Tracy Alloway）为您带来我们对市场、金融和经济最新发展的看法。有时是我们的专家嘉宾和消息来源网络提供的内容。不管是什么，我们保证永远有趣。【原文：Hello and welcome to the newsletter, a grab bag of daily content from the Odd Lots universe. Sometimes it's us, Joe Weisenthal and Tracy Alloway, bringing you our thoughts on the most recent developments in markets, finance and the economy. And sometimes it's contributions from our network of expert guests and sources. Whatever it is, we promise it will always be interesting.】

item.title: 对塞内加尔可能重整债务的担忧加剧，塞内加尔欧洲债券下跌
item.description: 塞内加尔美元债券周四下跌，是新兴市场中表现最差的债券之一，因为人们越来越担心该国可能不得不进行债务重组，这可能会给投资者带来巨大损失。【原文：Senegal dollar bonds fell and were among the worst performers in emerging markets on Thursday as concerns grow the nation may have to restructure its debts, potentially threatening hefty losses for investors.】

item.title: 黑格塞斯的短信暴露了也门袭击的敏感细节
item.description: 国防部长皮特-黑格塞斯（Pete Hegseth）在用个人手机发送即将实施的军事打击的细节时暴露了敏感信息，据五角大楼监察部门对今年早些时候震惊白宫的 "信号门 "事件的调查。【原文：Defense Secretary Pete Hegseth exposed sensitive information when he sent details of a pending military strike from his personal phone, according to a Pentagon watchdog investigation into the “Signalgate” saga that gripped the White House earlier this year.】

item.title: 贝恩资本与 SMBC 成立 15 亿欧元欧洲贷款平台
item.description: 私人市场公司贝恩资本（Bain Capital）和日本三井住友银行（Sumitomo Mitsui Banking Corp.【原文：Private market firm Bain Capital and Japan’s Sumitomo Mitsui Banking Corp. are joining forces for a new European loan platform targeting corporate borrowers in Europe and UK.】

item.title: EQB 股价大涨，因为杂货店银行业务交易抵消了收益不佳的影响
item.description: 加拿大 EQB 公司同意收购该国最大连锁超市的银行业务组合后，其股价创下一年多来的最大涨幅。【原文：EQB Inc.’s stock rose the most in more than a year after the Canadian lender agreed to buy the banking portfolio of the country’s largest supermarket chain.】

item.title: 国际货币基金组织认为阿根廷实现年底储备目标面临挑战
item.description: 国际货币基金组织（International Monetary Fund）敦促哈维尔-米莱（Javier Milei）政府增加外汇储备，因为该组织承认阿根廷实现年底积累目标将是一项 "挑战"。【原文：The International Monetary Fund urged Javier Milei’s government to build up its foreign reserves as it acknowledged Argentina meeting its end-year accumulation target will be “challenging.”】

item.title: 巴西燃油计划打击引发分销商股价反弹
item.description: 对巴西能源行业有组织犯罪的全面打击，正在帮助该国的燃料分销商从非法经营者手中夺回业务，使其股价飙升。【原文：A sweeping crackdown on organized crime in Brazil’s energy sector is helping the country’s fuel distributors claw back business from illegal operators, sending their stock prices soaring.】

item.title: 尼日利亚制定雄心勃勃的计划，目标是到 2028 年实现近 8%的增长
item.description: 作为非洲最大的产油国，尼日利亚制定了雄心勃勃的三年增长目标，该目标在很大程度上依赖于非石油部门。【原文：Nigeria set an ambitious three-year growth target that leans heavily on the non-oil sector in Africa’s biggest oil-producing nation.】
